column7: History of Islamic thought from the time of Muhammad to the present, including the prophethood of Muhammad, the Qur'an, theology and law, mysticism and philosophy, sectarian movements, modernism and legal reform, and contemporary resurgence. Same as SAME 214. Credit is not given for both REL 213 and REL 214.
column9: Same as SAME 214. Credit is not given for both REL 213 and REL 214.
column10: Humanities - Hist & Phil, and Cultural Studies - Non-West course.
